g.title: Play #1: all (1)->task_7cd1bcef-b5e8-493a-b4e4-3701bc014d23
g.text: 157 [when: not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy")ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedb.stat.exists]

g.text: 159 [when: not (ansible_distribution == "Ubuntu" and ansible_lsb.codename == "groovy")ansible_os_family == "RedHat" and not rhelaidedbnew.stat.exists]
